features: BIOME BALANCING TONER FOR FACE: Balance and revitalize your complexion with multi-tasking Andalou 1000 Roses facial toner spray. The dermatologically-tested daily toner helps balance skin’s microbiome, promoting a more healthy-looking, toned complexion

TONER FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: This daily spray face toner is formulated with our unique Rose-Biotic Blend, consisting of Rosa Centifolia Extract, Postbiotics & Alpine Rose Stem Cells to help protect against free radicals, soothe, nurture & revitalize skin "

SOOTHING AND GENTLE: This daily toning face mist is gentle on skin with a light, natural rose fragrance for a refreshed feel. The hyaluronate and aloe add hydrating benefits to dry, irritated skin. Use the skin toner any time before or after makeup

CLEAN SKINCARE STANDARDS: Andalou Naturals products are always cruelty-free, formulated gluten-free, and free from potentially harmful ingredients such as parabens, phthalates, sulfates SLS & SLES, petrochemicals, GMOs, synthetic colors and dyes, and artificial fragrances

FRUIT STEM CELL SCIENCE: Every Andalou Naturals product—including masks, creams, serums, moisturizers, cleansers, and toners—use nature's antioxidant defense solution to protect and support healthy skin and hair
body.description: Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Toner Andalou Naturals 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Toner is a gentle, refreshing facial toner, formulated with our unique Rose-Biotic Blend which harnesses the delicate strength of roses and postbiotics to help soothe, nurture and fortify the skin. It helps protect against free radicals and balance the skin’s microbiome, while promoting a more healthy-looking, toned complexion. Rosa Centifolia Extract helps smooth the skin's texture, and postbiotics strengthen the skin's barrier. Alpine Rose Stem Cells protect and restore vitality, Rosa Centifolia and Gardenia Flower extracts help balance the skin’s microbiome and even out skin tone. A blend of gentle Rose and Sunflower Seed Oils help create a protective skin barrier to counteract free radicals. Fruit Stem Cell Science is our signature innovation for skin care products to protect and support healthy skin. Our products feature only ingredients that are organic, gluten-free, sustainable, cruelty-free and nature-derived. Non-GMO remains a core brand value of Andalou Naturals and we continue to source superior non-GMO ingredients for our products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1000 Roses Gentle Cleansing Foam 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Toner 1000 Roses Fresh + Dewy 2-in-1 Serum 1000 Roses Soothing Squalane Oil 1000 Roses Biome Balancing Day Cream 1000 Roses Fortifying Night Cream Benefits Gently washes away makeup and pollutants without stripping essential moisture Refreshing mist toner that soothes and calms your senses with roses Helps hydrate and nourish with postbiotic rose water, vitamins, and hyaluronic acid Locks in moisture to protect the skin barrier and deliver a dewy glow Lightweight everday cream that helps balance the skin microbiome Rich, luxurious cream that helps soften, smooth, and soothe skin overnight When to Use AM & PM AM & PM or throughout the day AM & PM AM & PM AM PM How to Use Apply to damp skin, gently massage in a circular motion, and rinse clean. Close your eyes and gently spray onto face. Shake to activate. Apply on clean face and neck Gently press a few drops onto cleansed face & neck or mix in with moisturizer Massage in to face and neck Massage in to face and neck

Key Ingredients Alpine Rose Stem Cells Alpine Rose Stem Cells are sustainably derived from a rose variety that grows in extreme conditions in the Swiss alps to help improve skin vitality and protect the skin barrier from oxidative stress Aloe Vera Organic Aloe Vera Leaf Juice helps revive the skin's moisture barrier and soothe dry, irritated skin Vitamin E Vitamin E derived from sunflower to protect against environmental aggressors and promote moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Andalou 1000 roses toner
reviews.reviewText: I like all the Andalou 1000 Roses products. Lovely light scent, safe for sensitive skin, never drying or greasy, always just right. Toner feels so good when sprayed on my face, preps my skin for moisturizer to soak right in. Toner, foaming face wash, day cream moisturizer always on my bathroom counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this line
reviews.reviewText: Use it before bed, spray face and neck area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this! Is very refreshing. Hydrates the skin & smells like a beautiful rose. It awakens ur skin & ur senses. Hass been at least 2 yrs and I still use it. Try it u'll love it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing and feels great on my skin and makes it look more even.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really did good to my skin
reviews.reviewText: My daughter introduce me to this and I like the smell immediately. Not only that it made my skin smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toner, gentle, but not my favorite
reviews.reviewText: I like this & for the cost, it’s very good. It doesn’t quite get accepted into my skin like Osea , t Bart said, it’s a third of the cost. So, for the cost, it’s a great, healthier toner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin is glowing
reviews.reviewText: Love how it leaves my skin glowing looks brighter nice light scent works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural and refreshing
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite toners. Natural with a light scent of roses. Keeps my face hydrated. Would definitely buy again regularly.
Muy fan de este tónico.Maravilloso Inci.🥰
Llego super rápido,bien empaquetado y es una diferencia en mi piel desde la primer puesta,me gusto

Je suis une fan inconditionnelle de cette marque découverte aux USA. Heureusement qu'on peut trouver quelques-uns de leurs produits sur Amazon !Composition parfaite. Convient aux peaux sensibles, très rafraichissant, l'odeur de rose n'est pas très prononcée et se dissipe dès que le toner sèche. Ne tiraille pas la peau mais il faut penser à fermer les yeux avant de vaporiser !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 12, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Would purchase again. Delicate scent. A great toner or refresher
